means: 臂板信号系统，（铁道）臂板信号装置

sentence.Network_en: It is like a semaphore signal waving before the eyes of the particle physicists.
sentence.Network_cn: 它好象是在粒子物理学家眼前挥动的旗语信号.

sentence.Network_en: Any target can be assigned a semaphore, by setting a variable called on that target.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何目标都可以被赋予一个信号灯semaphore,方法是对该目标设置一个名为的变量.

sentence.Network_en: Me ( Beautifully pronouced, with choice semaphore ): " I want a divorce. "
sentence.Network_cn: 我 ( 用选好的语句, 优雅地大声说 ): “ 我要离婚. ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...信号量（semaphore）的数据结构为一个值和一个指针，指针指向等待该信号量的下一个进程。信号量的值与相应资源的使用情况有关。当它的值大于0时，表示当前可用资源的数量；当它的值小于0时，其绝对值表示等待使用该资源的进程个数。注意，信号量的值仅能由PV操作来改.
信号灯（semaphore）是一种用于提供不同进程间或一个给定进程的不同线程间同步手段的原语（引自Unix网络编程第2卷进程间通信 …
通常使用信号(semaphore)或排他资源(mutex)如果通过统一任务的优先度，在访问资源时，不必发生竞争任务的切换。
旗语(Semaphore)锁定非常类似于互斥锁定，其区别是，旗语锁定可以同时由多个线程使用。旗语锁定是一种计数的互斥锁定。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (denoting a signalling apparatus): from French sémaphore, formed irregularly from Greek sēma 'sign' + -phoros

encyclopedia.content: 信号量 信号量(Semaphore)，有时被称为信号灯，是在多线程环境下使用的一种设施， 它负责协调各个线程， 以保证它们能够正确、合理的使用公共资源。 信号量的概念 Semaphore分为单值和多值两种，前者只能被一个线程获得，后者可以被若干个线程获得。 以一个停车场是运作为例。为了简单起见，假设停车场只有三个车位，一开始三个车位都是空的。这时如果同时来了五辆车，看门人允许其中三辆不受阻碍的进入，然后放下车拦，剩下的车

entry.def: Semaphore is a system of sending messages by using two flags. You hold a flag in each hand and move your arms to various positions representing different letters of the alphabet.

means.word_mean: 1. an apparatus for visual signaling with lights or mechanically moving arms
1. send signals by or as if by semaphore

auth_sentence.content: A common semaphore...is a quick grimace flashed by one man...to his partner behind his raised glove.
auth_sentence.res_content: A common semaphore...is a quick grimace flashed by one man...to his partner behind his raised glove.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A common semaphore...is a quick grimace flashed by one man...to his partner behind his raised glove.

auth_sentence.content: Flag semaphore uses rods or flags held in particular positions to send messages to the receiver watching them some distance away.
auth_sentence.res_content: Flag semaphore uses rods or flags held in particular positions to send messages to the receiver watching them some distance away.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Flag semaphore uses rods or flags held in particular positions to send messages to the receiver watching them some distance away.

auth_sentence.content: She had never been to Germany before, and now she was seeing the country only as geographic semaphore.
